title: France panorama. [No. 73/06]
brief_description: French cinemagazine items including: 1. Cease-fire - the last meetings between American and Vietnamese representatives and the signing of the cease-fire. 2. Honors for Chandigahr - the Institut de la Vie honors the Indian builders of Chandigahr. 3. The NASA Medal goes to Professor Blamont - Professor Blamont and space. 4. In the news: City-planning - a new administrative building for the capital. Decoration - rocks and crystals. Baranoff and Mansouroff - Russian painters at the Museum of Modern Art.
